docstring.long_description: If the result is not found, it passes the result of the parent node.
docstring.short_description: Capture and save the results of a specified block over time. This block is almost always used in a LOOP.

parameters.name: referred_node
parameters.description: The node ID to capture the result from.

returns.description: The result of the specified node ID, or the result of the parent node if it was not found.
